FuncDef: This command removes all idle MSAPs associated with the MSAP policy.This command only removes idle MSAPs without active subscribers. This command is considered safer than theclear>subscr-mgmt>msap-policymsap-policy-nameidle-onlycommand because in that command, the parameteridle-onlyis optional. Not specifyingidle-onlydeletes MSAPs with active subscribers.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MSAP policy for which all associated idle MSAPs are cleared.
